name: Mr. Bloppy Saves the World
overview: You play as Mr Bloopy, a rotund shape shifting goo. In the opening credits we learn he is a space agent working for ‘Blue Peace’ and has been sent to Earth to stop the global leaders ‘Pollution Unlimited.’ As Mr Bloopy your primary goal is to complete levels through a combination of color swapping and puzzle solving. These can range, although, the vast majority consist of color coded tile dropping puzzles and swapping-tile picture puzzles.
